solution_line_template: Angeli and Marlon ate a total of {slices_per_person} x {number_of_people} = <<{slices_per_person}*{number_of_people}={total_slices_eaten}>>{total_slices_eaten} slices of pizza.
Thus, {initial_slices} - {total_slices_eaten} = <<{initial_slices}-{total_slices_eaten}={slices_left}>>{slices_left} slices of pizza are left.
